TopicTitle: Tier1 Trailerpark as a SpaceCenter somewhere on Kerbin?

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

as the Tier-1 Trailerpark was not accepted by the community as the starting Tier for a Spaceprogram and the Models for it are probably still on someones Harddrive at Squad, how about they add it to the Scenery on Kerbin as a

third Space Center?

Maybe somewhere in the Badlands or something.

But the main reason for this Thread is to Show the community's opinion if they would like the idea to have it around or to get rid of the idea.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited December 17, 2014 by MalfunctionM1Ke
It's coming, it just couldn't be done to a satisfactory standard in time. It is important to check facts before starting a discussion.

It's coming, it just couldn't be done to a satisfactory standard in time. It is important to check facts before starting a discussion.

Oh it is? Where did I miss it?

In this case please someone lock this thread
Yes, these buildings are not discarded, but post-poned. And thread closed by request.
